phase.name: load_analyze
phase.T2: Check pattern library for similar bugs
phase.T3: Load relevant code sections based on hot paths

phase.name: pattern_matching
phase.T8: Check historical fixes for this codebase

phase.name: hypothesis
phase.T11: Generate primary hypothesis from best pattern match

phase.name: solution
phase.T21: Retrieve fix template if pattern matched
